extra_info_md: Note: 你好 is a fixed greeting. In casual speech tone sandhi may apply to 你好 (nǐ typically becomes a half-third).

definition_vi: bạn / bạn (ngôi thứ hai số ít)

extra_info_md: Note: 叫 is used in introductions: 我叫 + name。
Note: the second syllable xie is commonly pronounced in a neutral tone in natural speech.

definition_vi: không cần khách sáo / không có gì
example_meaning_en: A: Thank you. B: You're welcome.
example_meaning_vi: A: Cảm ơn. B: Không có gì.

extra_info_md: Note: in duìbuqǐ the middle syllable 'bu' is often reduced in natural speech.
